globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 2
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 3
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
Some credits at a seedy cantina help you discover a black market sale at a dock in the lower levels. A few more credits reveal a name: Ras. This is not the name you wanted to hear. He's the Rebellion’s primary shipping contact on Cloud City.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.

eventActions.theText: The dock is crowded, but you can spot a locked door leading to the control area. Luckily, a docked freighter appears to be unguarded. Maybe its systems are still connected to the dock.

entityProperties.name: Terminal Dock
entityProperties.theText:
The main console of the old freighter can be used to override the door lock to the dock control area.

{-} A Rebel figure can interact with the terminal ({J} or {I}) to try and unlock the door.

eventActions.theText:
This could be your chance to get to Ras before it is too late.

{-} The door is locked.
{-} A Rebel figure can interact with the terminal ({J} or {I}) to try and unlock the door.
{-} The mission will progress when the door is unlocked.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.
Unlock the door.

{-} The door is locked.
{-} A Rebel figure can interact with the terminal ({J} or {I}) to try and unlock the door.
{-} The mission will progress when the door is unlocked.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
You put a few more holes in the console before turning back to the wounded Ras. His interference ended; he will answer directly to High Command.

"I told you this would happen," Lando gloats, looking over the wares. "Ah, this is good brandy. My lucky day."

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Rebel players choose one hero to receive the “Lady Luck” Reward card.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
Unaware of the situation, additional Wing Guard arrive to find you assaulting a critical industrial dock. You are led away under guard. Though Lando helps you smooth things over (with a sizable sum of credits), you were unable to resolve Ras's treachery.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

eventActions.theText:
You start to slice into the dock's systems.

{-} Test {I}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the terminal, then discard all strain tokens on the terminal. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText:
You don't make any progress. You need to keep trying.

{-} Place 1 strain token on the terminal for each {B} result gained.

globalEvents.name: Terminal Dock Success
globalEvents.eventText:
The main console of the freighter beeps, then the heavy locks slide off the door to the control area.

{-} The door to the dock control area is now unlocked to Rebel figures.

entityProperties.name: Terminal Dock
entityProperties.theText:
The main console of the old freighter can be used to override the door lock to the dock control area.

{-} A Rebel figure can interact with the terminal ({J} or {I}) to try and unlock the door.

entityProperties.name: Door 1
entityProperties.theText:
A sturdy security door leads into the dock control area.

{-} The door is locked to Imperial figures.

eventActions.theText: Block access to the door.
Enter the control area.

{-} The door is locked to Imperial figures.
{-} The mission will progress when the door opens.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: Cornered!
globalEvents.eventText: The door opens into the brightly lit control area.

eventActions.theText: Block line of sight to Ras and access to the terminal.

entityProperties.name: Door 1
entityProperties.theText:
A sturdy security door leads into the dock control area.

{-} The door is locked.
{-} A Rebel figure can interact with the terminal ({J} or {I}) to try and unlock the door.

eventActions.theText: A man in the uniform of a shipping official is standing at the end of the room.
"Looks like you rubes were paying attention, after all." Ras fidgets with a console.

entityProperties.name: Terminal Logs
entityProperties.theText:
The dock's logging console contains all the discriminating data Ras collected on the Rebel Alliance.

{-} A Rebel figure can interact with the terminal ({J} or {I}) to try and delete the data.

eventActions.theText:
"But you're too late. I've got a deal with the Empire, and these shipping logs will make me rich. Who could have known 'to' and 'from' labels could be so valuable? Your secret bases won't be secret for long!"

He has barely finished speaking when more troops rush in to stop you.

You start firing shots in Ras's direction, who quickly ducks behind the terminal.

{-} A Rebel figure can interact with the terminal ({J} or {I}) to try and delete the data.
{-} The Rebels win when the data is deleted and Ras is defeated.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

You start to slice into the logging console.

{-} Test {I}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the terminal, then discard all strain tokens on the terminal. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText:
You don't make any progress. You need to keep trying.

{-} Place 1 strain token on the terminal for each {B} result gained.

globalEvents.name: Terminal Logs Success
globalEvents.eventText: There it is - the shipping manifest, the logs, everything that you needed to make sure the Rebel bases are secure!

globalEvents.name: Ras Defeated
globalEvents.eventText: After a few attacks, Ras collapses to the ground.

eventActions.theText: Delete the data from the logging console. Defeat Ras.

{-} A Rebel figure can interact with the terminal ({J} or {I}) to try and delete the data.
{-} The Rebels win when the data is deleted and Ras is defeated.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.
Delete the data from the logging console.

{-} The Rebels win when the data is deleted.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.
Defeat Ras.

{-} The Rebels win when Ras is defeated.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.
None

{-} The Rebels win when the data is deleted and Ras is defeated.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: The Upper Hand
globalEvents.eventText: "Ras, I told you what would happen if you 'lost' another one of my shipments," you overhear, punctuated by blaster fire. You aren't the only aggrieved party.
